alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Fayette; Harrison; Scott (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:10PM EDT until June 25 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Scott County in central Kentucky... West central Bourbon County in central Kentucky... Northern Fayette County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Harrison County in central Kentucky... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 910 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Stamping Ground, Sadieville, Longlick, Leesburg, Skinnersburg, Moon Lake Estates, Muddy Ford, Broadwell and Davis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Kentucky. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
